item.title: Vox on AI as a threat to humanity
item.description: Vox has a new piece on AI, why people fear it, and the threats that it might pose to the human race: The case for taking AI seriously as a threat to humanity This piece gives a brief overview of AI for those who are unfamiliar with any of the technical details. We are seeing a growing awareness of ethical and even existential issues related to artifical intelligence and machine learning.
